name: Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard
name_original: Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard
description:
Get ready for a fictional account of the world's most popular video game hero... of the 1980s. Matt Hazard is coming out of retirement and making his next-gen 'comeback' against all his old enemies in a hilarious parody of the last 25 years of action games.
When he finally gets the call to make his official comeback, he finds out he's not the star, but the prey. Matt must defeat the game where the programmers aren't playing by the rules. They're throwing everything at him in their arsenal from old enemies, to past environments, unfair weapons, and more, to make sure he doesn't make it to the last level.
Key Features
Ingenious storyline and setting that's never been explored in a video game
Celebrity voice talent: Neil Patrick Harris (How I Met Your Mother) and Will Arnett (Arrested Development)
Hilarious script written by WGA Award-winning writer, David Ellis
Unique visuals, taking on tons of classic video game bad guys at once: cowboys, space marines, wizards and karate masters.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
